.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkPipelineDynamicStateCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PIPELINE_DYNAMIC_STATE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkPipelineDynamicStateCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkPipelineDynamicStateCreateInfo-flags-zerobitmask]] pname:flags must: be `0`
* [[VUID-VkPipelineDynamicStateCreateInfo-pDynamicStates-parameter]] pname:pDynamicStates must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:dynamicStateCount valid elink:VkDynamicState values
* [[VUID-VkPipelineDynamicStateCreateInfo-dynamicStateCount-arraylength]] pname:dynamicStateCount must: be greater than `0`
****
